tswitem.name: Signet of Blessed Steps
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Blessed Steps
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you apply a barrier effect to an ally, that ally gains a beneficial effect which increases Evade Chance by 4%/8%/12% for 10 seconds. This effect is removed when the barrier effect is removed from that ally. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans or Weapons.
